standard_units.docs:
**boolean**: `True` to use standard units or `False` to use  environmental units. Defaults to `True`.

*See also: [PMSA003I Particulate Matter Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pmsa003i.html#configuration-variables)*

pm_1_0.docs:
Mass of particles with a diameter of 1 micrometres or less (μg/m^3). All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [PMSA003I Particulate Matter Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pmsa003i.html#configuration-variables)*

pm_2_5.docs:
Mass of particles with a diameter of 2.5 micrometres or less (μg/m^3). All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [PMSA003I Particulate Matter Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pmsa003i.html#configuration-variables)*

pm_10_0.docs:
Mass of particles with a diameter of 10 micrometres or less (μg/m^3). All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [PMSA003I Particulate Matter Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pmsa003i.html#configuration-variables)*

pmc_0_3.docs:
Count of particles with diameter > 0.3 um in 0.1 L of air (#/0.1L). All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [PMSA003I Particulate Matter Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pmsa003i.html#configuration-variables)*

pmc_0_5.docs:
Count of particles with diameter > 0.5 um in 0.1 L of air (#/0.1L). All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [PMSA003I Particulate Matter Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pmsa003i.html#configuration-variables)*

pmc_1_0.docs:
Count of particles with diameter > 1 um in 0.1 L of air (#/0.1L). All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [PMSA003I Particulate Matter Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pmsa003i.html#configuration-variables)*

Count of particles with diameter > 2.5 um in 0.1 L of air (#/0.1L). All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

Count of particles with diameter > 5 um in 0.1 L of air (#/0.1L). All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [PMSA003I Particulate Matter Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pmsa003i.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**[Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to check the sensor. Defaults to `60s`.

*See also: [PMSA003I Particulate Matter Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pmsa003i.html#configuration-variables)*

address.docs:
**int**: Manually specify the I²C address of the sensor. Defaults to `0x12`.

*See also: [PMSA003I Particulate Matter Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pmsa003i.html#configuration-variables)*
